竱字的基本解释

竱
zhuǎn
等；相当；均齐。

竱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuǎn］
［《廣韻》旨兗切，上獮，章。］
［《廣韻》多官切，平桓，端。］
(1)齐；等。
(2)通“專”。参见“竱力”、“竱心”。

竱字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【立字部】　竱； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页873第07
【廣韻】旨兗切【集韻】主兗切，?音轉。【說文】等也。【齊語】竱本肇末。【韋註】竱，等也。肇，正也。謂先等其本以正其末也。　又【集韻】株戀切，音囀。義同。　又都玩切，音鍛。【廣雅】齊也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?多官切，音端。義同。

竱字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
竱字的起名意思

暂无。

竱
Basic explanation of words
竱
zhuǎn
Etc.; quite; evenly.
竱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuǎn］
["Guangyun" aims to cut, top, chapter. ]
["Guangyun" multi-official cut, Pinghuan, Duan. ]
(1) Qi; etc.
(2) Through "special". See "Xin Li", "Xin Heart".
竱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Li Zi Department] 　竱; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 873 No. 07
[Guangyun] Purpose Yanqie 【Jiyun】Mainly Yanqie, and the sound turns. [Said the text] Wait too. [Qiyu] The beginning of the end. [Wei Note] Long, wait too. Zhao, Zheng Ye. That is to wait for the original to correct the end.　[Jiyun] The love of each plant, the sound. The same meaning.　I play cutting and sound forging again. [Guang Ya] Qi Ye.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Multi-official cut, sound end. The same meaning.

Name meaning

zhuǎn
упорядочить, привести в порядок, держать в равновесии
